title: Could it happen here?
creator_credit: R. Crawford, Ron Marton and Chris Noonan
brief_description: A short film made by the pupils of the North Sydney Boys’ High School, showing the school as a prison camp with the pupils as regimental inmates. Subtitled “The Great Escape”, it tells the story of the planning and execution of an escape. Prize-winner at the 1970 Sydney Film Festival.
